entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries early this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
